title: Policy Violation Investigation
description: A DLP tool flags an employee for attempting to email a sensitive document to their personal email address, violating policy. A GRC analyst must investigate.

tasks.description: Review the DLP alert, confirming the user, the document classification, and the recipient email address.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst confirms a policy violation occurred.

tasks.description: Interview the employee and their manager to understand the reason for the policy violation.
tasks.expected_outcome: The employee states they were trying to work from home and were unaware of the policy.

tasks.description: Document the violation, confirm the employee has been re-trained on the correct policy, and close the case.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst follows the standard procedure for handling a minor, unintentional policy violation.
